interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hoop Headbands for Women Premium Tortoise Acetate Wide Headbands No-Slip Grip Hair Hoop Styling Accessorie for Girls,Twin Pack(Marble)
Review Date: 2020/11/12
Store: CÉLLOT
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Number of Items': '2', 'Brand': 'CÉLLOT', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 5.59 x 1.26 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: I got these headbands for my children (who keep breaking their narrower headbands. These seem very sturdy. There are 3 sets of tiny teeth on the underside, spaced about 4" apart from each other that hold the headband in even the finest of hair without being uncomfortable. The teeth are small and probably fragile. These headbands appear to be 2 thinner headbands fused together. The top is completely smooth, the bottom has a small ridge running down the middle. One headband is a rainbow of colors, the other is mottled blue and green. Both headbands are about one inch wide. They do a good job holding fine straight or curly hair away from the face. They fit my 3 year old and my 6 year old perfectly, comfortable without slipping. They are tight on an adult head, and squeeze my skull uncomfortably at the base. In my opinion these are ideal for kids and teens but not so great for adults. The "end holders" to keep them in shaper are just tiny sections of thin rubber tubing. We probably won't be using them.
Review Title: Fits kids
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Type:A - Aluminum Free Deodorant for Men – Trailblazer- Unscented, Spice & Forest – Sweat Activated Technology, Natural Ingredients, Non-Toxic, Paraben Free, Non-Irritating, 2.8 Ounce (3 Pack)
type:A
{'Brand': 'Type:A', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Item Volume': '2.8 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5 x 0.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
It doesn't work as well as old spice to prevent odor and sweat, but it does leave less residue on shirts. The spice scent smells like patchouli and mint, the evergreen scent smells strongly of pine trees, and unscented smells like baby powder. I can't say we are particularly fond of any of the scents. My husband is planning to use this set up, but we will probably not reorder it.
Not fond of the smells
Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle
WORKMAN'S FRIEND
{'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.5 x 2.3 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'UPC': '023857030709'}
We do a lot of house work, art, construction work, and gardening. We use a lot of soap. That orange goop with pumice in it is our normal heavy duty hand cleaner, this soap is equivalent to that soap without the orange scent. You definitely do need water for it to be effective even though the bottle claims you don't. The hand cream is a great heavy duty healing lotion, similar to eucerin. I haven't noticed an appreciable difference in the ease of cleanymy hands after using the barrier cream however.
Helps dirty hands
HIFAU Eyebrow Scissors 3 In 1 Kit, Eyebrow Razor and Comb Foldable Protection, Surgical Grade Stainless Steel Eyebrow Scissors and Tweezers, Mirror Polished, Easy to Carry, Travel Gift
HIFAU
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 2.4 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '634923554380'}
The razor cuts your skin but not your hair. The comb is cheap plastic that breaks if you look at it sideways. The tweezers aren't very good at gripping. The only good thing about this set are the little scissors. Those work well.
The scissors are the only things that work
100pcs Premium Quality Hair Clips, 20 Glossy Colors Snap Hair Clips, 2 Inch Hair Barrettes with Perfect Grip, Durable Colorful Hair Clips with Smooth Edges for Kids, Girls, Women
Fagaci
{'Brand': 'Fagaci', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Assorted', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Alloy Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 3.1 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces'}
The colors are not as pictured. There is no bright orange or pale yellow, there are a lot of browns and many more muted pastel colors. The package arrived open with clips strewn about the box. That being said, they stay in my daughter's super fine hair better than the clips of this type we have used before. They have stayed in through a full school day and gymnastics class without falling out. They do have some rainbow colors, just not as many as we'd hoped for. We got 105 clips. So it the colors are important to you, know that they are on the more pastel side of what's pictured and that there is no true orange. They don't come in a giftable package. If staying in hair is what is important to you, these can't be beat.
Muted colors, super staying power
Barber Hair Cutting Cape for Men Women, Made with Ultra Soft Silk Fiber, 63" x 57"
SmoTecQ
{'Package Dimensions': '11.8 x 9.2 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'}
The front of this cape is super long (almost too long) however the back is cut in a way such that no matter how you adjust the neck, only about the top 12" of the back are covered, leaving the lower back exposed. It is like a long rectangle with the corners of the short end joined behind the neck at a diagonal. It is better than nothing but the cut is just off. Maybe if you have an actual barbers chair it works better. I was using a towel as a cape when I cut my husband and kids hair, and this on top of a towel for the lower back (or two of these capes alternating directions so the long part can go in the front and the back) should do a better job than just the towel. The fabric is cheap thin polyester, which gets the job done but is definitely not "ultra soft silk fiber" as stated in the description. The neck is easy to adjust and fasten, so at least it has that going for it.
Strange cut
Hoop Headbands for Women Premium Tortoise Acetate Wide Headbands No-Slip Grip Hair Hoop Styling Accessorie for Girls,Twin Pack(Marble)
CÉLLOT
{'Number of Items': '2', 'Brand': 'CÉLLOT', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 5.59 x 1.26 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}

There are 3 sets of tiny teeth on the underside, spaced about 4" apart from each other that hold the headband in even the finest of hair without being uncomfortable. The teeth are small and probably fragile. These headbands appear to be 2 thinner headbands fused together. The top is completely smooth, the bottom has a small ridge running down the middle. One headband is a rainbow of colors, the other is mottled blue and green. Both headbands are about one inch wide. They do a good job holding fine straight or curly hair away from the face. They fit my 3 year old and my 6 year old perfectly, comfortable without slipping. They are tight on an adult head, and squeeze my skull uncomfortably at the base. In my opinion these are ideal for kids and teens but not so great for adults. The "end holders" to keep them in shaper are just tiny sections of thin rubber tubing. We probably won't be using them.
Fits kids
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user prioritizes high-performance personal care products, particularly deodorants and heavy-duty hand care, with a focus on effective odor and sweat prevention, as well as cleaning efficacy.

- **Scent Sensitivity**: The user has a strong aversion to potent scents, preferring truly neutral or mild fragrances and having had negative experiences with scents like patchouli, mint, and pine.

- **Texture, Residue, and Effectiveness**: The user avoids products that leave greasy or staining residues, valuing performance and user experience. They often compare with well-known brands, seeking sensory-sensitive solutions that deliver results without offensive scents.

- **Natural Ingredients**: A commitment to natural, non-toxic products free from harmful chemicals reflects the user’s conscientious approach to personal care.

- **Grooming Tools Evaluation**: The user has provided mixed reviews on grooming kits and accessories, most recently expressing dissatisfaction with a hair cutting cape, indicating high standards for grooming products.

- **Reorder Willingness**: Cautious about reordering, the user is open to alternatives that align with their quality, safety, and sensory preferences.

- **Hair Accessories Interest**: Recently purchased accessories demonstrate the user’s interest in practical hair tools, particularly for children, while critiquing product fit and comfort. They favor products that are functional for kids and teens but may not suit adult needs, maintaining a critical eye on product presentation and effectiveness.

The user maintains a thoughtful and discerning approach to personal care, focusing on effectiveness, quality, and ingredient safety.
